com.wedriveu.services.vehicle.entity

Interface VehicleStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VehicleStoreImpl

    public interface VehicleStore
    This inteface models the Vehicle' database domain.

    • Method Detail

      • addVehicle

        void addVehicle(io.vertx.core.eventbus.Message vehicle)
        A new vehicle is being added to the json file. if the vehicle already exists (the licencePlace is already there) it sends back a message containing a negative boolean, or positive otherwise.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - Indicates the vehicle the will be added to the db.

      • theVehicleIsInTheDb

        boolean theVehicleIsInTheDb(java.lang.String carLicensePlate)
        Parameters:
        carLicensePlate - Indicates the id of the vehicle that i want to know if it exists.
        Returns:
        Return True if the vehicle exists in the db, False otherwise.
